title: Understanding and Application of Large-Scale MIMO Communication Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Basic communication systems knowledge and linear algebra fundamentals
context.additional_context: Project-based learning in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment to apply large-scale MIMO communication principles to real-life contexts.

learning_goals: One can explain the basic operation of large-scale MIMO systems under imperfect channel state information (CSI)
One can implement core concepts of deep learning-based beamforming technology through project assignments
One can perform MIMO communication performance optimization simulations using smartphones in constrained technical environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
